00001 <?php
00002 /** @file
00003  * Tests for the QueryPath library.
00004  * @author M Butcher <matt@aleph-null.tv>
00005  * @license The GNU Lesser GPL (LGPL) or an MIT-like license.
00006  */
00007 
00008 require_once 'PHPUnit/Autoload.php';
00009 require_once 'src/QueryPath/QueryPath.php';
00010 
00011 /**
00012  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00013  */
00014 class QueryPathEntitiesTest extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00015   public function testReplaceEntity() {
00016     $entity = 'amp';
00017     $this->assertEquals('38', QueryPathEntities::replaceEntity($entity));
00018     
00019     $entity = 'lceil';
00020     $this->assertEquals('8968', QueryPathEntities::replaceEntity($entity));
00021   }
00022   
00023   public function testReplaceAllEntities() {
00024     $test = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root>&amp;&copy;&#38;& nothing.</root>';
00025     $expect = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root>&#38;&#169;&#38;&#38; nothing.</root>';
00026     $this->assertEquals($expect, QueryPathEntities::replaceAllEntities($test));
00027     
00028     $test = '&&& ';
00029     $expect = '&#38;&#38;&#38; ';
00030     $this->assertEquals($expect, QueryPathEntities::replaceAllEntities($test));
00031     
00032     $test = "&eacute;\n";
00033     $expect = "&#233;\n";
00034     $this->assertEquals($expect, QueryPathEntities::replaceAllEntities($test));
00035   }
00036   
00037   public function testReplaceHexEntities() {
00038     $test = '&#xA9;';
00039     $expect = '&#xA9;';
00040     $this->assertEquals($expect, QueryPathEntities::replaceAllEntities($test));
00041   }
00042   
00043   public function testQPEntityReplacement() {
00044     $test = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root>&amp;&copy;&#38;& nothing.</root>';
00045     /*$expect = '<?xml version="1.0"?><root>&#38;&#169;&#38;&#38; nothing.</root>';*/
00046     // We get this because the DOM serializer re-converts entities.
00047     $expect = '<?xml version="1.0"?>
00048 <root>&amp;&#xA9;&amp;&amp; nothing.</root>';
00049     
00050     $qp = qp($test, NULL, array('replace_entities' => TRUE));
00051     // Interestingly, the XML serializer converts decimal to hex and ampersands
00052     // to &amp;.
00053     $this->assertEquals($expect, trim($qp->xml()));
00054   }
00055 }
